ClientModel

Class Agent

  • java.lang.Object
    • ClientModel.Agent

  • public class Agent
extends java.lang.Object
    Purpose: A representation of an agent (pedestrian). It has X-Y start and goal positions as well as speed. An agent will only move towards its goal destination, and it will eventually try to avoid colliding with other agents of its kind.
    Version:
    1.0 03/01/2018
    Author:
    Amin Yassin

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Agent(javafx.scene.paint.Color color)
      Constructor of an Agent (pedestrian).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      float getPosX()
      Returns the X position of the Agent.
      float getPosY()
      Returns the Y position of the Agent.
      void moveToGoal()
      An agent checks its distance to goal and moves towards it.
      void tryAvoidingCollision()
      Moves an Agent faster towards its goal destination.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Agent

        public Agent(javafx.scene.paint.Color color)
        Constructor of an Agent (pedestrian). Y start and goal positions are randomized between 120.0 and 570.0. Speed is also randomized between 0.0 to 1.0.
        Parameters:
        color - This color must only be either blue or orange.
